reviewText: Very inspiring and historically informative
oh wow, how amazing!  Love learning history
So well done.
Very inspiring life!

We enjoyed this DVD tremendously.  Samuel Morris made a huge difference at Taylor University and has statues of him there.  His greatest desire was to learn about the Holy Spirit and this young Liberian ended up teaching his teachers by his powerful testimony and love for his fellow man.
This film may not be for everyone, but if you are ready to be inspired and willing to be challenged, you will find it a real gem.

I had not expected "animation" as part of this documentary.  Nor was it listed as a documentary, but should have been.  I had expected a dramatic performance by good actors, portraying the life of this wonderful young man, who obviously was called (and sent) by God, but perhaps this was the only thing that could be done.  I am very glad to learn of such a wonderful life, however short, that accomplished so much.  We need a "Samuel Morris" today.--

WOW! What an incredible testimony of a simple obedient servant of Christ. This was so inspiring I am going to watch it again, probably several times. I am looking forward to meeting this man in heaven.

Thoroughly enjoyed this documentary about a very young man's that God used to change the world. I had not read, nor heard, anything about this story until browsing options on Amazon. An inspiring film of the power of God in the life of anyone that He reveals Himself through.
Creates a thirst for genuine Christian living and prayer

This story is an amazing story of a young man's perseverance in following what he knew what God wanted him to do. The logistics of how it came to pass at that time in history are completely unusual and almost unbelievable. Of course, we know it was believable, since it is a true story. I was spellbound as to how this turned out.
I would recommend it to anyone for the inspiration it provides.
Great human interest story on man's relationship with God.
Good documentary on this little known figure in our history.
Awesome and inspiring story.  Read the book but now the movie, great!
Truly inspiring and profoundly faith provoking. Certainly a wonderful testimony to the goodness and grace of Jesus Christ.
Very interesting documentary!
Samuel Morris's journey of faith is a wonderful antidote for discouragement.

Great service, fast delivery from the shipper.

It is truly unfortunate and sad that this is listed under childrens books
I had never heard of Samuel Morris before reading this biography which was recommended by a friend. It sounded too good to be true, so I did a bit of research and was blown away by what I found.  It is all true; he truly put his faith in action and obeyed because he believed the Word. How this world would be changed if we all just truly put action to our intellectual understanding of the Bible.

Samuels story is an inspiration to hear God's voice and follow His leading. I have purchased several books and given them away. I highly recommend this book.
Wonderful and inspiring a must see
Interesting and unusual. I never would have guessed anything like Morris making such an impact in conservative Indiana.
A wonderful story of the power of God
mistake will never do this again. I would rather ask an African myself then to listen to someone else opinion
I had never heard of Samuel.  Wonderful story!
Amazing account of this young man. Glad it was brought to my attention.
Awesome! If more of us possessed his faith, what a difference we could make!!!!!!
Did not find the filming style enlighten. Did not enjoy.
Very interesting and informative
Great, everyone should watch.
Amazing story must see
A great real life story of faith and being about the Father's business.

He was a true man of God and an inspiration for his brothers and sisters in Christ. The intimate walk he had with God is available for all who will  pray and obey and trust as he did. God is the rewarder of them that diligently seek Him Hebrews 11:16.  Jesus in the book of John 14:12- 18 " I tell you the truth, anyone who has faith in me will do what I have been doing. He will do even greater things than these, because I am going to my Father. And I will do whatever you ask in my name. so that the Son may bring glory to the Father. You may ask me for anything in My name and I will do it. If you love Me you will obey My command. And I will ask the Father and He will give you another Counselor to be with you forever -- the Spirit of Truth. The world cannot accept Him because it neither sees Him nor knows Him. But you know Him for He lives with you and will be in you. I will not leave you as orphans; I will come to you."

Sammy Morris may have been a wonder, a boy struck by the power of God. This film, however, is a badly made public relations gimmick.  Sammy Morris was and is a tool in the hands of self righteous, self seeking, pompous manipulators. His story needs to inspires. The obnoxious background music does not disguise the fact that stiff, wooden men using stiff wooden words do not to tell a story that inspires. The black man, who was used in too few scenes, was a relief to see and hear in an otherwise terrible film.
A great story of one who God used in a powerful way.  I would have liked the ending to be more uplifting, but I don't pretend to understand God or be able to walk on water.
Extraordinary movie.
Just Ok
I had never heard of Samuel Morris before this. What an amazing work of gracious and glorious God.
PROBABLY THE BEST TESTIMONY OF JESUS CHRIST I HAVE EVER HEARD! Thank the LORD for allowing us to witness his power like this. Jesus, please awaken our nation to see your majesty.

This is one of the most inspiring documentaries I've ever seen. Samuel Morris' story is one of a kind and full of the fruit and ministry of the Holy Spirit.
Enjoyed this very much, inspired to be a more committed lover of Christ.

Ready to be inspired by a young African boy? Well, you are in the right place. Samuel Morris was a Liberian boy who came to America in the late 1800s by simple faith. He died young but the impact he had would live on forever.
Such an amazing story of a life fully lived unto the Lord!!!!

this documentary was well done. it was true to the way people were at the time and the presence of the Holy Spirit in the lives of mankind, regardless of who you were.  It is an amazing testimony, and should be highly esteemed as Harriet Beecher's Stowe's masterpiece.  I think that it should be shown more widely.

A humble, simple, yet powerful  young man of God who, like precious few believers (especially in this current age), actually wholly believed the Word and operated in the fulness of the Holy Ghost; and  in doing so "moved mountains", as it were, thousands of miles from his native homeland.

I am surprised I had never heard of him prior...What an incredible person.

Amazing grace of God at work. Samuel Morris believed and trusted God for the direction of his life. God used it to bring many more people to His Kingdom. Very touching and encouraging to watch for all of us young and old alike.
One of the best missionary films I have seen.  Wish I could have known him or that I knew anyone with faith like his except Mr. Billy Graham.
Inspiring African patriarch of pure faith
Good! but the book is better.
Very interesting documentary.
This is one of the most fascinating stories about Mission Field I have ever seen. I have recommend it to my Christian friends.
What an inspiring life!
Again i see God's work in the lives of those who allow Him to use them. Our God is an awesome God!

very interesting and encouraging on how a man's love and faith in God endure hardships and still have the strength to pursue more of God and have a passion for others to know also. People loved this young man and he helped keep a university going through his death. Nice documentary.

An amazing instance of God's radical and sovereign grace in creating a story that could well nigh be torn out the very pages of Scripture. Jesus is risen as the faithful Israelite and is raising up humble sons and daughters of God from every nation, tongue, and tribe.

This is an excellent overview of the life and faith of Samel Morris.  It is worth watching as well as reading the book.  We read a book about
Samuel Morris many years ago, and it is refreshing to see more information about him and his inspiring life of faith.
It is so wonderful!!!

Excellent documentary on the life of Samuel Morris. The way that this was presented was very well done. I enjoyed the animation-style illustrations throughout the documentary. This enhanced the production. I did not know anything about Samuel Morris (Prince Kaboo) until this viewing. He went through much hardship and struggles in his native country of Liberia at such a young age. Then his trip to the United States in the late 1800's had problems as well. But Samuel had a faith that grew stronger every day and nothing would stop him. He came to know and love God so much that he spread that love and knowledge to others with surprising results. Even though he lived a short life, his effect on those he encountered lasted a lifetime. This is an extraordinary story with great commentary, footage, and illustrations that I am sure will leave viewers inspired and awed. As one of the persons from the documentary mentioned" "the power of the Holy Spirit bears fruit that lasts forever". That is so true with Samuel Morris.

The story of Samuel Morris is a powerful depiction of a life captured by the love of God. Like many christian mystics his life held elation and unbearable suffering that was made meaningful by his direct experiences with God.  The reimagining of his brief life strums the heart strings and is like a brisk wind that keeps you in its grip until it fades away. The world needs more men and women like Samuel Morris!
Great documentary and testimony to the power and sovereignty of God.

This African man, with his own ancient concept of God and goodness, was a living example of how Christians are supposed believe and  behave towards others, Too bad when he died his teachings of love, faith, and compassion for others died with him,
